060bff78-16f5-4439-a5c0-5a57c19821e8:
A divine herbalist combines alchemy, acupuncture, and divine magic to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} wounds by touch. She can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 1 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. With one use of this ability, she uses positive energy to heal the target of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} for every 2 oracle levels she has. Using this ability is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} unless the oracle targets herself, in which case it is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. This ability counts as a paladin's lay on hands ability for the purposes of {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, and effects that work with that class feature when it is used for healing purposes. Unlike lay on hands, this ability cannot be used to harm undead.
This ability replaces the revelation gained at 1st level.
8bf7fe4f-c065-4ccb-a394-a587f3b5891e:
A divine herbalist has mastered countless alchemical techniques that supplement her divine powers and greatly aid her when she heals the sick and wounded. She gains a competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature) checks{/g} equal to 1/2 her oracle level (minimum 1), and uses her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier when attempting Lore (nature) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
This ability replaces the additional class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} the oracle gains from her mystery.
fb4b14e4-7d02-4a22-9593-48e57cb4495b: A lone strider is a recluse who gained her oracular powers from isolation in a deep desert, on a mountain peak, or in another secluded location. A connection to untraveled places gives the lone strider powers to evade her enemies.
aa3b4306-ab57-4df7-aedd-e5258d3313f9: A lone strider must choose a mystery that adds {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} to his list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
fca90626-7ca3-4159-9936-bb6ab7e7faa8: Add all summon nature's ally {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} to your spell list. You must still select these spells using your allotment of spells known. Animals within 30 feet of you receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
7c1d0d00-694a-41be-a918-da6920015480: Although the gods work through many agents, perhaps none are more mysterious than oracles. These divine vessels are granted power without their choice, selected by providence to wield powers that even they do not fully understand. Unlike clerics, who draw their magic through devotion to a deity, oracles garner strength and power from many sources, namely those patron deities who support their ideals. Instead of worshiping a single source, oracles tend to venerate all of the gods that share their beliefs. While some see the powers of the oracle as a gift, others view them as a curse, changing the life of the chosen in unforeseen ways.
21f12f54-68ab-41b6-a986-fc62f3240dca:
An affected creature moves and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} at a drastically slowed rate. Creatures affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} are staggered. Additionally, it takes a â€“1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. A slowed creature moves at half its normal {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}.[LONGSTART]
Multiple slow effects don't stack. Slow dispels haste.[LONGEND]
5c878921-d5d1-4b2f-b813-dcc814eb5a27: An oracle can {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} her wounds as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. With one use of this ability, an oracle can heal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} of damage for every two oracle levels she possesses.
999b8b9e-47b4-4b16-aefd-e76887261455: An oracle can {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} the wounds of others by touch. With one use of this ability, an oracle can heal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} of damage for every two oracle levels she possesses. Using this ability is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
7bd8e612-62f6-433a-a24a-820cc0e014fd: An oracle with the ancestor mystery adds all Knowledge and Lore {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} to her list of class skills.
030dc7ed-d557-4062-86a4-adb821a193b5: An oracle with the battle mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
0f68cd2e-7ff2-47a4-b9d6-94f4a7ac5ace: An oracle with the bones mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
0715db03-f890-41e3-8b6a-2825829735f4: An oracle with the flame mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
db7596b9-770d-4f7d-bbfa-4f75e5199ce6: An oracle with the life mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
0af0a2ca-d6e1-409e-8b44-1ca0515daf08: An oracle with the nature mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
45e81847-d119-420b-8435-76dedeb19417: An oracle with the stone mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
3b808a2f-c1b2-47c4-ab2e-004af6ce4646: An oracle with the waves mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
271427fc-90f5-487c-aa5c-3b67e211d77d: An oracle with the wind mystery adds {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
4f5253ca-96c2-43ad-968d-a3fd91d5e239: As a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, you can deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per level to objects or constructs. You can use this ability once per day, plus one time per day for every three levels you possess.
4e5ea548-eedf-42c9-9d92-b6c28092a845: As a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, you can unleash a ray that causes a target to gain one negative level. The ray has a range of 30 feet. This negative level lasts for a number of minutes equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. Whenever this ability gives a target a negative level, you {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time at 11th level and every four levels thereafter. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
79f2dcab-cfa4-4d14-82b8-703482df18eb: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, you can call upon your ancestors to grant you extra bravery in battle. You gain a +1 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against fear for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus. At 7th level, this bonus increases to +2, and at 14th level this bonus increases to +3. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level, and every five levels thereafter.
b971ab64-bd3e-45b1-a4d2-42199c155d95: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, you can call upon your ancestors to provide council. This advice grants you a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on your next {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d20{/g} roll in the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus.
2a5abdf1-9bd9-478c-aad5-41a0f4cd1200: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can assume the form of a Small fire elemental, as elemental body I. At 9th level, you can assume the form of a Medium fire elemental, as elemental body II. At 11th level, you can assume the form of a Large fire elemental, as elemental body III. At 13th level, you can assume the form of a Huge fire elemental, as elemental body IV. You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour/level. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
ca87c166-7cfa-440a-b817-c1e74533aed6: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can become incorporeal and invisible. While in this form, you can move in any direction and through any object (except for those made of force). You remain in this form for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability once per day at 11th level, and twice per day at 15th level. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
6a3d4055-ca09-4de3-899c-6c31976ae5f5: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can become invisible (as per the invisibility {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}). You can remain invisible for 1 minute per day per oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Starting at 9th level, each time you activate this ability you can treat it as greater invisibility, though each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} spent this way counts as 1 minute of your normal invisibility duration. You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.
2fc134d0-94dc-4e13-a457-781ef142ab05: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can breathe a 30-foot line of electricity. This line deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} per oracle level. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
4e6ddee5-d5a5-488e-9a0a-4c5e3350b819: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can cause fire to erupt around you. You can create one 20-foot-radius area of fire. Any enemy caught in these flames takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per oracle level, with a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} resulting in half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. This fire lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. You can use this ability once per day. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
deb123af-176c-4c05-9015-0fa2711a66fc: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can create a blast of air accompanied by a loud peal of thunder. The blast has long range and has a 20-foot radius. Creatures in the area take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per oracle level, with a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} resulting in half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 11th level and every four levels thereafter.
fb448ca4-e71e-49c4-841c-5391c9121f53: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can create a blizzard of snow and ice. You can create a 20-foot-radius storm. Any enemy caught in the blizzard takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per oracle level, with a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} resulting in half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The storm lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier; the ground remains icy (+5 to {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g}) as long as local conditions permit. You can use this ability once per day. You must be 11th level to select this revelation.
f06a7e6b-14f3-49f8-b7d2-36808767abf7: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can perform a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that causes a living creature to become shaken. This ability lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your oracle level (minimum 1 round). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
6e3ed6a3-e88e-4667-b113-a02a39b619c4: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can perform a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} +1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon that you wield gains corrosive enchantment.
5f7f7014-abbf-43de-b710-34dcd21f3ca4: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can perform a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} + 1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. You can use the wintry touch ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon that you wield is treated as a frost weapon.
174bc6da-0205-45f8-b107-43d53062acb9: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can perform a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} +1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon that you wield is treated as a shock weapon.
74012257-b0bb-4d94-bcc5-23d8a4543636: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can perform a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} +1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon that you wield is treated as a flaming weapon.
c9387076-9567-4cfe-a377-59386400ce25: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash a 15-foot cone of flame from your mouth. This flame deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per level. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter. The save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}-based.
a2b7098a-936f-4f4d-afd5-d5cf7bee5f46: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an inspiring battlecry. All allies within 100 feet who hear your cry gain a +1 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 10th level, this bonus increases to +2. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every five levels thereafter.
2229a136-08be-4466-b4cf-7a4e78caf303: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you charge and throw a pebble that detonates when it strikes a target as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The pebble has a range increment of 20 feet. Any creature struck by the pebble takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per two oracle levels you possess (minimum 1d6). Creatures in squares adjacent to the target take half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, or no damage if they make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} misses, treat the pebble as a thrown splash weapon to determine where it lands. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
3ff86a2f-94c4-40e6-806f-db2064c7db8d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you may create a bond between yourself and another creature. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} at the start of your turn, if the bonded creature is wounded for 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} below its maximum hit points, it heals 5 hit points and you take 5 hit points of damage. You may have one bond active per oracle level. This bond continues until the bonded creature dies, you die, or the target ends it as an {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
cfb33c48-4a92-4835-b3ff-90c6ea9f262d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you can cause jagged pieces of stone to explode outward from your body. These shards deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} per two oracle levels (minimum 1d6) to all creatures within a 10-foot burst. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
14503623-c55a-4cd6-b87b-e41eb92fc42d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you can cause waves of heat to radiate from your body. This heat deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per two oracle levels (minimum 1d4) to all creatures within 10 feet. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. In addition, your form wavers and blurs, granting you 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} until your next turn. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
533cee1a-702a-49ea-8c58-dbd3a7b66306: At 10th level, you can teleport a medium distance as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You can teleport a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
32b6755f-de9b-44f4-8b8b-be24baad3ad7: At 11th level, a purifier can consume a curse, enchantment, or emotion effect by touch as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. She can do this a number of times per day equal to her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, and must make a dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to Charisma modifier against the effect. If the check succeeds, the effect is negated; however, the purifier is sickened for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
85c82b3b-61e3-441b-a275-6048b5cb2e9a:
At 1st level, 3rd level, and every four levels thereafter (7th, 11th, and so on), an oracle uncovers a new secret about her mystery that grants her powers and abilities. The oracle must select a revelation from the list of revelations available to her mystery. If a revelation is chosen at a later level, the oracle gains all of the abilities and bonuses granted by that revelation based on her current level. Unless otherwise noted, activating the power of a revelation is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
Unless otherwise noted, the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} against these revelations is equal to 10 + 1/2 the oracle's level + the oracle's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
975f725b-1c03-4433-a9c2-a42d5729a20c: At 20th level, all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with acid descriptor cast by the oracle are always empowered, as though using the Empower Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
9b6e2cdb-c8f8-4e4c-ad7c-e4bbc644f192: At 20th level, all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with cold descriptor cast by the oracle are always empowered, as though using the Empower Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
4a6c9513-7e07-4fe3-9a06-a8a2f9520570: At 20th level, all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with electricity descriptor cast by the oracle are always empowered, as though using the Empower Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
4a88185b-7823-4453-8152-c330d2af7e4c: At 20th level, all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with fire descriptor cast by the oracle are always empowered, as though using the Empower Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
9defec15-e391-401d-acac-df2115ab637d: At 20th level, an oracle learns the final revelation about her mystery, granting her amazing powers and abilities. The nature of these bonuses depends upon the oracle's mystery.
9fffa005-445a-4f49-a6e5-361c051a0c72: At 20th level, you have discovered the intrinsic secrets of life itself, granting you incredible control over your own body. Once per day, you can change your type to plant, animal, or humanoid, gaining superficial physical characteristics as appropriate, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. This change does not alter your {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} points, class skills, or proficiencies. Each time the transformation is made, you are cleansed of all poisons or diseases, are restored to full hit points, and {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}. You must select a new type every time the transformation is made.
b9d949b2-f6f9-4ab4-8065-c3dfc894c48a: At 5th level, a purifier may channel holy power as a cleric of her level to harm evil outsiders . She may use this ability a number of times per day equal to 1 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
792d3425-ae89-49fe-8988-12e9e81d7257: At 5th level, once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, you gain a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against the first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
9d7f968c-1702-4dc0-82a0-d7f8b46e6b53: At 5th, 10th, and 15th levels, a seeker gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} from the list:
102f4015-4dce-4fa8-9550-37e4e7aae748: At 7th level, a purifier's armor takes on a golden or silvery sheen and becomes light as a feather. Her armor weighs half as much as long as she wears it. She also gains armor training as a fighter 4 levels lower than her oracle level. At 11th level, a purifier gains heavy armor proficiency.
2f81ed9b-f361-42f3-9b0b-556c22cd1e4a:
At 7th level, whenever a divine herbalist heals a living creature with her healer's way ability, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} she can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature) check{/g} to remove certain conditions from the target, with each condition set having an accompanying Lore (nature) {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} (see the list below). Failure by 5 or more causes the target to become sickened for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} (if the divine herbalist is attempting to remove the sickened condition, this extends it by 1 round). Similarly, failure by 10 or more instead causes the target to become nauseated for 1 round or to have its existing nauseated condition extended by 1 round. A creature that cannot be sickened or nauseated cannot have conditions removed by this ability.
Minor Conditions (DC 20): Fatigued, shaken, and sickened.
Major Conditions (DC 25): Dazed and staggered.
Severe Conditions (DC 30): Confused, exhausted, frightened, and nauseated.
Dire Conditions (DC 35): Blinded, paralyzed, and stunned.
This ability replaces the revelation gained at 7th level.
41d1c253-9f67-43ee-ac1e-5f08de0e83a2: At 7th level, whenever there are no enemies within 10 feet, you gain 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. At 14th level, you instead gain 50% concealment for one round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your oracle level.
24aa914c-0959-4b31-acc2-72163a83eda2: At 7th level, whenever there are no enemies within 10 feet, you gain 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. At 14th level, you instead gain 50% concealment for one round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your oracle level.
2958a3c8-40ec-42eb-93bc-d99f437e14a2:
Capricious fey constantly bedevil you, playing pranks on you such as tying your shoelaces together, hiding your gear, making inappropriate noises or smells at formal events, and mimicking your voice to tell embarrassing lies.
In addition to any social consequences of such mischief, you take a â€“4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}. Add faerie fire to your list of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} known.
At 5th level, add glitterdust and mirror image to your list of spells known.
At 10th level, add confusion to your list of spells known as a 5th-level spell.
At 15th level, add insanity to your list of spells known.
7037c983-088d-4857-b6f0-2b76361d9919: Dire Conditions ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 35): Blinded, paralyzed, and stunned.
67f5a910-46cb-49af-b378-6cd515789177: Dire Conditions ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 35): Blinded, paralyzed, and stunned.
2ceb90cd-c2e7-4925-bcb6-823f8f983ce4: Divine herbalists practice an obscure alchemical art which involves medicinal and restorative techniques that transcend ordinary alchemy, allowing them to blur the line between alchemical medicine and divine miracles.
7020ddfb-394a-49a8-aaa8-efad44385870:
Each oracle draws upon a divine mystery to grant her {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and powers. This mystery also grants additional class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and other {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g}. This mystery can represent a devotion to one ideal, prayers to deities that support the concept, or a natural calling to champion a cause. Regardless of its source, the mystery manifests in a number of ways as the oracle gains levels. An oracle must pick one mystery upon taking her first level of oracle. Once made, this choice cannot be changed.
At 2nd level, and every two levels thereafter, an oracle learns an additional spell derived from her mystery.
49136ca4-aa59-4a16-b57a-6be8676eb4ac: Each oracle is cursed, but this curse comes with a benefit as well as a hindrance. This choice is made at 1st level, and once made, it cannot be changed. The oracle's curse cannot be removed or dispelled without the aid of a deity. An oracle's curse is based on her oracle level plus one for every two levels or {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} other than oracle.
aac42d6c-5de8-486e-b445-f68a32cd83e6: Every oracle devotes their life to studying some mystery. The mystery determines the oracle's specialization, giving them certain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and revelations â€” abilities that empower their oracle in their chosen role.
93b1d9a3-ee2f-4f80-bd15-35e6e034db02: Every oracle has a curse that gives them certain penalties and bonuses. As the oracle advances, their curse becomes less detrimental and more beneficial. For example, the Blackened curse impedes the oracle's abilities to hit an enemy with a weapon, but grants them a number of fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
f846a4c1-de22-432a-b429-dfcaf89ff89a: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} gained by oracles as they gain levels, each oracle also adds all of either the {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} spells or the inflict spells to her list of spells known (cure spells include all spells with "cure" in the name, inflict spells include all spells with "inflict" in the name). These spells are added as soon as the oracle is capable of casting them. This choice is made when the oracle gains her first level and cannot be changed.
5fb5f7b0-9775-4d76-bef1-608bd08f7d59: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} gained by oracles as they gain levels, oracle adds all the inflict spells to her list of spells known (inflict spells include all spells with "inflict" in the name). These spells are added as soon as the oracle is capable of casting them.
30c2619b-4d2f-46ad-b51f-9b61c2b23878: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} gained by oracles as they gain levels, oracle adds all the {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} spells to her list of spells known (cure spells include all spells with "cure" in the name). These spells are added as soon as the oracle is capable of casting them.
c800c7df-21ba-4521-95bb-9360ea6ba783:
Infernal influence grants you profane insight and weighs on your soul.
Creatures instinctively distrust you, and you take a â€“3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} when used for diplomacy.
You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Persuasion skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} when used to intimidate or bluff. Persuasion becomes a class skill for you.
At 5th level, you gain a +4 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against charm effects.
At 10th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire.
At 15th level, any weapon you wield is treated as lawful and evil for the purposes of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
5710c28c-d696-4e7f-b116-1f36dd5890bb: Minor Conditions ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 20): Fatigued, shaken, and sickened.
9e916c06-668c-4a81-aa39-b89ef27f616a: Minor Conditions ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 20): Fatigued, shaken, and sickened.
19a613f4-bde1-482a-b2a3-d66569909649: Once per day, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you can use this ability to gain a re-{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} on the next failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} that causes you to become blinded, deafened, frightened, panicked, paralyzed, shaken, or stunned, with a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on the roll. At 7th and 15th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.
cbeeb190-3295-4a0a-b958-ea7afad82069: Once per day, your skin hardens and takes on the appearance of iron, granting you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/adamantine. This functions as stoneskin {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, using your oracle level as the {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. At 15th level, you can use this ability twice per day. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
8c835d49-f849-448d-838c-ddd117e89264:
One of your legs is permanently wounded, reducing your base land {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} by 10 feet. Your speed is never reduced due to encumbrance.
At 5th level, you are immune to the fatigued condition (but not exhaustion).
At 10th level, your speed is never reduced by armor.
At 15th level, you are immune to the exhausted condition.
87c4e575-9a78-42de-ada6-3b876c299960: Oracles are powerful divine {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasters{/g} who have access to the most powerful divine magic. They can effectively {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} and empower their allies, or devastate their enemies. Oracles have access to a limited number of spells and only gain new ones as they advance in level. This makes them less flexible, but they can cast more spells before needing a {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}.
9000ae85-5c56-45ae-bf5f-513aeeec5130: Oracles are proficient with all {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}simple weapons{/g}, light armor, medium armor, and shields (except tower shields).
04aa3e3a-be02-48ae-b200-a40e369f8897: Oracles gain their magical powers through strange and mysterious ways, be they chosen by fate or blood. While most might be content with their strange powers, some oracles join the Pathfinders specifically to find out more about their mysteries and determine the genesis and history of their eldritch talents. These {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasters{/g} are known as seekers, after their obsession with researching ancient texts and obscure ruins for any clues they can find about their heritage and histories.
4ad83f8f-027d-427b-8bfd-90de9bb257f2: Oracles know a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Cantrips_Orisons}orisons{/g}, or 0-level {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. These spells are cast like any other spell, but they do not consume any slots and may be used again.
5d918e8a-ce78-4b19-8ecc-d7e258a782f7: People often find themselves listening to the rustle of the wind, but only a handful of them hear whispering of the mighty nature element, and can use it as a source of power.
1469cbec-7151-4adb-9b9d-2cee9267320e: Seekers often look to ancient devices, old tomes, and strange magical items in order to learn more about their oracle mysteries. As a result of this curiosity and thanks to an innate knack at deciphering the strange and weird, a seeker gains {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} as a class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. In addition, at 1st level, a seeker adds half his oracle level on Trickery skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} (minimum +1).
caa1202f-8a0c-46d0-bd6c-10def1362ddd: Select one type of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. When performing the selected maneuver, you treat your oracle level as your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} when determining your {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}. At 7th level, you gain the Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} (such as Improved Trip) that grants you a bonus when performing that maneuver. At 11th level, you gain the Greater feat (such as Greater Trip) that grants you a bonus when performing that maneuver. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.
05bbe2ee-f506-44e1-8afc-4c8dad8e889e: Severe Conditions ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 30): Confused, exhausted, frightened, and nauseated.
d950b62a-565c-4b57-b542-d1926235e126: Severe Conditions ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 30): Confused, exhausted, frightened, and nauseated.
5ee7ef9f-0dd4-4e74-b402-92c3a36fdb29: Some oracles are possessed by spirits, demons, or similar beings. Instead of drawing her powers from deities, a possessed oracle has these otherworldly forces work their magic through her.
42b7481a-f508-40d1-a6f7-c1afa9ee6387: Starting at 15th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a wind whisperer can affect all allies in a 30-foot radius with the freedom of movement {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effect for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. This ability can be used once per day plus one more time for every 6 oracle levels.
0189e24a-090f-4926-a162-df73f974119c: Starting at 7th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a wind whisperer can affect all allies in a 30-foot radius with the haste {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effect for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. This ability can be used once per day plus one more time for every 6 oracle levels.
5f31a038-0a6e-4971-9677-d9740bfc7b80: The enlightened philosopher seeks truth through compassion, moderation, and humility. By following her philosophy's teachings, she aspires to reach enlightenment and become one with the universe.
284a1955-68b7-478e-a2fb-5b02afb9cf4d: The purifier seeks out signs of possession or mind control that manifest from unwilling (and often unwitting) servants for fiendish corruptors and their mortal minions. A purifier seeks liberation of mind, body, and spirit from the bondage of sin and the taint of the unholy.
8e6f2250-508c-4c1e-8a77-f8607c03c98f: These are the {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} and abilities that the oracle can choose at certain points of their development. They include both passive and active effects. For example the revelations of Life give the oracle the ability to channel energy, {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damaging{/g} a group of targets.
f74caddc-78f8-468e-8af6-371f8ab3b377:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} gives the character an ability to perform the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. It also grants a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} when performing this maneuver, and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against it.
You can attempt to hinder a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is successful, the target takes a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. The penalty is limited to one of the following conditions: blinded, entangled, or sickened.
This condition lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. For every 5 by which your attack exceeds your opponent's CMD, the penalty lasts 1 additional round.
5b997239-2744-4db8-badd-6fcca9975129: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants you a powerful sixth sense. Once foresight is cast, you receive instantaneous warnings of impending danger or harm to the subject of the spell. You are never {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g}. In addition, the spell gives you a general idea of what action you might take to best protect yourself and gives you a +2 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and on Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}.
7be70050-6d89-4430-b88e-62cd0b14b6e2: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} raises {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+2 undead skeletal champions. They appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
827cffd8-0746-453f-9f97-7d14e4d3a8f6: Upon achieving 20th level, you achieve true enlightenment and become one with the universe. You receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. You become immune to confusion, exhaustion, fatigue, nausea, and sickened effects. You can take 20 on all Knowledge {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. Once per day, should you die, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after dying you are reborn as a living example of the summoning of your chosen philosophy. Your body re-forms with all your equipment, and you return to life with maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}.
33833a79-7592-436e-9872-883ae729a505: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a master of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}. You can cast animate dead at will without paying a material component cost. Additionally, once per day, you can cast power word kill, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} can only target a creature with 150 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} or less.
ec9fa361-5848-4481-a037-d42d5e44a315: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a perfect channel for life energy. You become immune to bleed, death {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, exhaustion, fatigue, nausea effects, negative levels, and sickened effects.
2bfa7ae5-a614-4116-9066-edcd6a35cc5d: Upon reaching 20th level, you become an avatar of battle. You gain the Pounce ability. Whenever you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, you can ignore any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} the target might possess. Whenever an enemy tries to confirm a critical hit against you, you gain a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} for this {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}.
bf39544d-fd8e-44be-ad78-a8fd8dea04fd: Upon reaching 20th level, you become one with the spirits of your ancestors. You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, {g|Encyclopedia:Blindsense}blindsense{/g} up to a range of 60 feet, and a +4 bonus on your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for all Divination {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. You can cast foresight as a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g} once per day.
92b1a668-e52d-4c78-9b1f-950bebe264ef: Whenever a creature takes {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} from one of your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and fails at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g}, it is slowed (as per the slow spell) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. At 11th level, the duration increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} rounds.
c1116303-4848-4de4-a0cf-95d5a576358d: Whenever a creature takes {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} from one of your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, it catches on fire. This fire deals 1 point of fire {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} at the beginning of the burning creature's turn. The fire lasts for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, but it can be extinguished if the creature succeeds at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} (using {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half Oracle level + {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier).
2a30aed1-dffb-47e0-a035-aac82e0e1dce: Whenever you are reduced to negative {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, you automatically start {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} 1 for every 5 oracle levels (min 1) for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} whenever you are reduced to negative hit points.
99e86f4d-f8e5-4f06-8e3f-ffc4028b9f69: Whenever you cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} (a spell with "cure" in its name), you can cast it as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, as if using the Quicken Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, by expending two spell slots. This does not increase the level of the spell. You can use this ability once per day at 7th level and one additional time per day for every four levels beyond 7th. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation (as the battle mystery revelation).
e966c83b-9fad-4899-9910-71f6e22f9527: Whenever you cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, the maximum number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} healed is based on your oracle level, not the limit based on the spell. For example, an 11th-level oracle of life with this revelation may cast cure light wounds to heal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g}+11 hit points instead of the normal 1d8+5 maximum.
b0652ca9-fe81-4977-8b6f-21f1ff748fcc: Whenever you cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cures{/g} the target of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} damage, you do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} for spellcasting.
602ffd77-0bc7-435e-a6d9-bb68f3beea56: Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} against an opponent with a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that requires an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, you may immediately attempt to trip your opponent as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. You do not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} as normal for this trip attempt. You cannot be tripped in return when using this ability.
04e5fec8-a53b-4300-b76e-62c4754ab323: Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} against an opponent with an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, the target is staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. At 11th level, the duration increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} rounds.
908a0229-5e43-4e76-bee1-d5a31fc5c40b: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g}, you can roll twice and take either result. At 7th level, you gain Uncanny Dodge. At 11th level, you can roll for initiative three times and take any one of the results.
2d214699-e9f0-4bd1-a23e-b5fa77aaa103: Whenever your {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} heal a target up to its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, any excess points persist for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per level as temporary hit points (up to a maximum number of temporary hit points equal to your oracle level).
1ba346ec-e0f5-4554-92bf-13f786e8446d:
You are forewarned of danger but can't act to prevent it. You gain uncanny dodge, as the rogue class feature, but you are staggered for the entire first {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} of combat.
At 5th level, you gain a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
At 10th level, you gain improved uncanny dodge as the rogue ability, using your oracle level as your rogue level.
At 15th level, you gain a +4 insight bonus on all your {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} during the first round of combat.
efee3963-dce4-42e4-8e8a-b5a18145a22d: You are treated as an undead creature when you are targeted by positive or negative energy. At 7th level, you receive channel resistance +2. This bonus increases by +2 at 11th and 15th level.
981b15a4-a022-4525-a1bb-a2d2a3e42ce4:
You can attempt to disarm a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} is successful, the target cannot use his weapons for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
For every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, the disarmed condition lasts 1 additional round.
93591497-f353-4f87-b80b-01d6efcf8b99:
You can attempt to dislodge a piece of armor worn by your opponent. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} is successful, the target loses its {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from armor for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
For every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} lasts 1 additional round.
1b6e8dd2-ee0b-4954-8f29-1683d4e4e844: You can call upon the spirits of your ancestors to form a shield around you that blocks incoming {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and grants you a +4 armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +2. At 13th level, this shield causes arrows, rays, and other {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} requiring an attack roll against you to have a 50% miss chance. You can use this shield for 1 hour number of times per day equal to oracle level.
66040ebf-575a-49c2-a913-53def291cb97: You can cause terrible wounds to appear on a creature with a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g} +1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. If used against an undead creature, it heals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and grants a +2 channel resistance for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
fb2eba06-f76f-4c03-ae5e-0832ff16857f: You can channel positive energy like a cleric, using your oracle level as your effective cleric level when determining the amount of damage healed (or caused to undead) and the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 1 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
5c106ef4-22e3-4a50-b59b-efb9a8400bce: You can conjure armor made of bones that grants you a +4 armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +2. At 13th level, this armor grants you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}. You can use this shield for 1 hour number of times per day equal to oracle level.
9cbb2230-601a-447f-863a-1db606374014: You can conjure armor of ice that grants you a +4 armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +2. At 13th level, this armor grants you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g}. You can use this shield for 1 hour number of times per day equal to oracle level.
7ebcdb4f-5b6e-4f33-9911-a1553be79905: You can create an invisible shell of air that grants you a +4 armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +2. At 13th level, this barrier causes incoming arrows, rays, and other {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} requiring an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} against you to have a 50% miss chance. You can use this shield for 1 hour number of times per day equal to oracle level.
c7b4c22a-4d78-4d97-b50b-596bab25f84b: You can draw life force from the bodies of enemies and channel it into yourself. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can drain the life essence from one living target within 30 feet. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two levels you possess (maximum 10d6). You gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to the damage you deal. The temporary hit points last a number of hours equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. The target receives a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} to halve the damage (and the temporary hit points you gain). You may use this ability once per day at 7th level, plus one additional time per day for every 4 levels you possess beyond 7th. You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.
302eceba-ae0d-413f-9fff-e92a2c710459: You can summon the spirit of a great warrior ancestor and allow it to possess you, becoming a mighty warrior yourself. You gain a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, and a +4 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. Your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} while possessed equals your oracle level (which may give you additional {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}), and any weapon you are wielding gains Keen enchantment. You can use this ability for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for every 2 oracle levels you possess. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-round increments. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
6b38b13e-5cd8-42bb-a46a-4e55358f9610: You can summon the spirits of your ancestors to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} in a ghostly barrageâ€”their fury creates physical wounds on creatures in the area. The storm has a range of 100 feet and is a 20-foot-radius burst. Objects and creatures in the area take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every two oracle levels you possess. Undead creatures in the area take 1d8 points of damage for every oracle level you possess. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} reduces the damage to half. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 11th level and every four levels thereafter.
77787255-6381-4f3d-80f9-572fc0738531: You can transform an opponent into a harmless animal as if using baleful polymorph. This transformation lasts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per oracle level. You may use this ability a number of times per day equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.
b7c8e728-bb1f-43a6-a9c2-ac05b3d0a5e6: You gain Weapon Focus. At 8th level, you gain Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Critical{/g}. At 12th level, you gain Greater Weapon Focus. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}.
fd730993-0a58-456c-9835-784225a4fd23: You gain a +2 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against diseases, mind-affecting effects, and poisons. At 7th level, this bonus also applies on saves against death effects, sleep effects, and stunning. At 11th level, the bonus increases to +4
5a11f21e-edf2-413e-a616-44d0fd02d3b6: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects. At 7th level, the bonus increases to +4.
9e24bf1a-655c-46bb-a3f5-b456091b2fea: You gain proficiency in all {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}martial weapons{/g} and heavy armor.
cb8e4300-87ab-46ae-9692-8efdfa19316e: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} acid 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to acid.
67c25d53-0e35-4e44-acb1-a29068db9479: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} cold 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold.
46048e06-059b-44f7-bacc-c5970cedfa66: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} electricity 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity.
6b182d27-78c4-4985-8d1b-1e1b7a134c30: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} fire 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire.
6443ecb5-8cba-423e-adf6-f1f24bd0196e: You have become so attuned to the whispers of the natural world, from the croaking of frogs to the groaning of great boulders, that your surroundings constantly keep you preternaturally aware of danger. You may add your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier, to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}. Any condition that would cause you to lose your Dexterity modifier to your Armor Class instead causes you to lose your Charisma modifier to your Armor Class.
31bf5026-f7c5-4ace-a04e-6fadfdcd3cb4: You notice and locate living creatures within 30 feet, just as if you possessed the blindsight ability. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
37c3a063-698c-444b-a541-1dc1a4dbce63: You receive a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g} against bull rush, grapple, and trip attempts. You gain +4 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} confirmation {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}. At 5th level, you gain Dodge as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. You do not need to meet the prerequisite to gain this feat.
60eda744-12db-4132-8acc-cf221f4c2b81: You receive a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g} when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground. At 5th level, you gain Improved Trip as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. At 10th level, you gain Greater Trip as a bonus feat. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to gain these feats.
9bb96ea9-7564-471c-9227-37ae2c2c0981:
You suffer from minor ailments and sicknesses. While you struggle to resist new diseases, you have grown accustomed to the many inconveniences of sickness.
You take a â€“1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against disease effects, but you are immune to the sickened condition.
At 5th level, add pox pustules to your list of 2nd-level oracle {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} known.
At 10th level, increase the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of any disease effect you create by +2.
At 15th level, you are immune to the effects of disease.
0b97c744-5ecc-4fe7-a2f8-3d42c0677fb1: You utter a single word of power that instantly kills one creature of your choice, whether the creature can hear the word or not. Any creature that currently has 101 or more {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is unaffected by power word kill.
52859ece-0afa-4082-ac3b-e0a5b2980226: Your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by 10 feet. At 10th level, you ignore difficult terrain. Oracles with the lame oracle curse cannot select this revelation.
60e8c9f6-0765-4b82-b22a-5c7951887301: Your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by 10 feet. At 5th level, once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, you gain a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against the first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}. At 10th level, you can teleport a medium distance as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You can teleport a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
bd1c1d47-9234-4b25-b69e-6cd9e4298c57:
Your body is slowly rotting away.
You take a â€“4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, except for {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} when used to intimidate. You gain a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} made against disease.
At 5th level, you are immune to the sickened condition (but not nauseated).
At 10th level, you gain immunity to disease.
At 15th level, you are immune to the nauseated condition.
0eef4679-babd-4633-b8d3-76db0679c607: Your explorations into the secret mysteries of the world have granted you a preternatural understanding of all things â€” and you just keep getting smarter. You gain a +1 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} upon taking this revelation and another at every third oracle level gained thereafter.
e5c76d00-c518-42c3-864a-1ed878c38473:
Your face is deformed, as though you were born with a wolf's muzzle instead of an ordinary nose and jaw. Many mistake you for a werewolf, and in areas plagued by lycanthropes, you must take pains to hide your face.
You gain a natural bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if you are a {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Medium{/g} creature or 1d3 points of damage if you are Small.
All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast have a 10% chance to fail.
At 5th level, you add magic fang to your list of known spells and your bite damage increases to 1d6 if you are Medium or 1d4 if you are Small.
At 10th level, the damage dealt by your bite attack increases to 1d8 if you are Medium or 1d6 if you are Small.
At 15th level, you add greater magic fang to your list of known spells and the damage dealt by your bite attack increases to 2d6 if you are Medium or 1d8 if you are Small.
64ff62b2-f2a8-4c5f-9956-c0ac96302943: Your form wavers and blurs, granting you 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} until your next turn.
95572af5-74d6-4046-b729-55e2d9176c46:
Your hands and forearms are shriveled and blackened, as if you had plunged your arms into a blazing fire, and your thin, papery skin is sensitive to the touch.
You take a â€“4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, but you add burning hands to your list of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} known.
At 5th level, add scorching ray and burning arc to your list of spells known.
At 10th level, add fire snake to your list of spells known and your penalty on weapon attack rolls is reduced to â€“2.
At 15th level, add hellfire ray to your list of spells known.
012d2fcb-6fa3-4ac8-a84e-5ccd55ed4301:
Your heart is cursed with the pull of the Abyss.
Creatures instinctively distrust you, and you take a â€“3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} when used for diplomacy.
You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Persuasion skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} when used to intimidate or bluff. Persuasion becomes a class skill for you.
At 5th level, you gain a +4 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects.
At 10th level, you gain immunity to poison.
At 15th level, any weapon you wield is treated as chaotic and evil for the purposes of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
